parts.text:
```json
{
  "trip_summary": {
    "from": "Osaka",
    "to": "Tokyo",
    "best_travel_options": [
      "Shinkansen (Bullet Train)"
    ],
    "estimated_budget_range": "$300 - $1000",
    "summary_description": "A trip from Osaka to Tokyo offers a blend of modern and traditional Japanese experiences. Traveling by Shinkansen is the fastest and most convenient option.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/osaka_tokyo.jpg"
  },
  "transportation": [
    [
      {
        "method": "Train",
        "service_provider": "Shinkansen Nozomi",
        "service_number": "N700",
        "from": "Shin-Osaka Station",
        "from_platform": "Varies, check boards",
        "to": "Tokyo Station",
        "to_platform": "Varies, check boards",
        "seat_class": "Ordinary, Green Car",
        "estimated_cost_range": "$130 - $180",
        "duration": "2h 30m",
        "booking_link": "https://www.jr-central.co.jp/en/",
        "icon_url": "https://example.com/shinkansen_icon.png",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/shinkansen_image.jpg"
      }
    ]
  ],
  "accommodations": [],
  "attractions": [
    {
      "name": "Tokyo Skytree",
      "description": "A towering broadcasting tower and a major landmark in Tokyo, offering panoramic views of the city.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Weekdays to avoid crowds, early morning or late afternoon for best lighting.",
      "entry_fee": "2,100 - 3,100 JPY depending on the deck",
      "location": "1 Chome-1-2 Oshiage, Sumida City, Tokyo 131-0045, Japan",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/tokyo_skytree.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "Senso-ji Temple",
      "description": "Tokyo's oldest temple, featuring a vibrant Nakamise-dori market leading up to the main hall.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Morning to avoid crowds, especially on weekends.",
      "entry_fee": "Free",
      "location": "2 Chome-3-1 Asakusa, Taito City, Tokyo 111-0032, Japan",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/sensoji_temple.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "Shibuya Crossing",
      "description": "The world's busiest intersection, a symbol of Tokyo's vibrant and energetic culture.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Any time, but especially impressive during rush hour.",
      "entry_fee": "Free",
      "location": "Shibuya, Tokyo, Japan",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/shibuya_crossing.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "food_recommendations": [
    {
      "dish": "Sushi",
      "description": "Fresh seafood on vinegared rice, a quintessential Japanese dish.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Tsukiji Outer Market (various stalls), Tokyo",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/sushi.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish": "Ramen",
      "description": "Noodle soup with various toppings, a comforting and popular dish.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Ichiran (various locations), Tokyo",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/ramen.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish": "Tempura",
      "description": "Deep-fried seafood and vegetables, light and crispy.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Tsunahachi (Shinjuku), Tokyo",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/tempura.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish": "Yakitori",
      "description": "Grilled chicken skewers, a popular izakaya (Japanese pub) snack.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Omoide Yokocho (Memory Lane), Shinjuku, Tokyo",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/yakitori.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish": "Monjayaki",
      "description": "A savory pancake similar to okonomiyaki, but with a runnier batter and unique flavor.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Monja Street, Tsukishima, Tokyo",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/monjayaki.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "travel_tips": [
    "Purchase a Japan Rail Pass if you plan on extensive train travel.",
    "Learn basic Japanese phrases for easier communication.",
    "Carry cash, as some smaller establishments may not accept credit cards.",
    "Be mindful of Japanese customs and etiquette.",
    "Consider purchasing a Suica or Pasmo card for easy subway and bus travel."
  ]
}
```
